Plot: In Gerritsens latest New York Times bestseller, medical examiner Maura Isles and detective Jane Rizzoli take on a society of scholars that studies the history of evil--and the grisly killer it has spawned.
Characters: Jane Rizzoli, Gabriel Dean, Dr. Maura Isles, Father Daniel Brophy, Barry Frost, Anthony Sansone, Lilly Saul, Angela Rizzoli
